basicInfo.name: Yui
basicInfo.flavor: Although Yui is young, she is recognized as a great prodigy because of her incredible musical skills. She is revered by all troubadours as a maestro.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Attack Reduction. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Magic Attack Reduction to 11%.

Skill 1.name: Healing Melody
Skill 1.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Continuous Healing. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Turns: Continuous Healing duration becomes 3 turn(s).
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 19% Physical Damage Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Damage Boost to 24%.

Skill 2.name: Battle Melody
Skill 2.desc:
2 Allies
 - Revives fallen target(s) with 35% HP.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 45%.

Passive.name: Battle Bard
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Burn Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Burn Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 22% of the caster's Max HP upon activating a skill 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 22% of Max HP upon activating a skill 1 time(s).

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: All of the Evan Expedition, chicken stew, baked sweet potato, cute things, harmony, naps, travel, songs
profile.dislikes: Cleo, Bella, carrots, strange things, dissonance, chaos

basicInfo.name: Yui
basicInfo.flavor: Yui was able to establish herself as a true trobairitz with her ability to express her feelings through song.

2 Allies
 - Revives fallen target(s) with 25% HP.

All Allies

profile.story: Yui was able to establish herself as a true trobairitz with her ability to express her feelings through song.

basicInfo.name: Yui
basicInfo.flavor: Even from a young age, Yui would often wander from town to town on the heels of her father, a bard. During these journeys, she'd often get caught up in her daydreams and wander off the path. This rather dangerous tendency ended up being the sign of something much greater: an innate talent for telling stories.

Skill Enhancement Effect

2 Allies

All Allies

 - Grants Burn Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
